item.title: CVE-2023-52136|2024-08-02T22:48:12.572Z -- smash%20balloon -- custom%20twitter%20feeds%20%E2%80%93%20a%20tweets%20widget%20or%20x%20feed%20widget
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Smash Balloon Custom Twitter Feeds – A Tweets Widget or X Feed Widget.This issue affects Custom Twitter Feeds – A Tweets Widget or X Feed Widget: from n/a through 2.1.2.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Smash Balloon Smash Balloon Social Post Feed.This issue affects Smash Balloon Social Post Feed: from n/a through 4.2.1.
